name: PreflightProfileRules
shortdesc: A collection of preflight profile rules.

method.name: add
method.shortdesc: Adds a new preflight rule to the profile.

parameters.name: id
parameters.shortdesc: The ID of the rule to be added

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new PreflightProfileRule (Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the PreflightProfileRule.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the PreflightProfileRule with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the PreflightProfileRule with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the PreflightProfileRule with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the PreflightProfileRules within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The PreflightProfileRule, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: PreflightProfileRule, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The PreflightProfileRule, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: PreflightProfileRule, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first PreflightProfileRule in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last PreflightProfileRule in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle PreflightProfileRule in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the PreflightProfileRule with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the PreflightProfileRule that follows the desired PreflightProfileRule.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the PreflightProfileRule whose index follows the specified PreflightProfileRule in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The PreflightProfileRule whose index comes before the desired PreflightProfileRule.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any PreflightProfileRule in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every PreflightProfileRule in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the PreflightProfileRule.
Returns the PreflightProfileRule with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
